scripts.typecheck: bun run typecheck:ts && bun run typecheck:rust
scripts.lint:ts: oxlint src --import-plugin --react-plugin --jsx-a11y-plugin --deny-warnings --report-unused-disable-directives -D correctness -D suspicious -D perf -A react-in-jsx-scope -A no-autofocus -A prefer-tag-over-role -A exhaustive-deps -A no-unassigned-import
scripts.lint: bun run lint:ts && bun run lint:rust
scripts.lint:fix: oxlint src --import-plugin --react-plugin --jsx-a11y-plugin --deny-warnings --report-unused-disable-directives -D correctness -D suspicious -D perf -A react-in-jsx-scope -A no-autofocus -A prefer-tag-over-role -A exhaustive-deps -A no-unassigned-import --fix
scripts.check: bun run lint && bun run typecheck && bun run fmt:rust:check
